nodes.text: Light assault vehicles, also known as LAVs, were small military landspeeders used from the Clone Wars to at least the Second Galactic Civil War. The Ultra-Light Assault Vehicle, or ULAV, was designed by Sienar Fleet Systems, and was used by a variety of governments, and Uulshos Manufacturing produced the LAVr QH-7 Chariot, which was used by the Imperial Army mainly to protect important command personal. By 40 ABY, a space-capable light assault vehicle by Uulshos existed, with Chandrila Skies being one such vessel.
